Gerania a new discovery of a little sort of people, anciently discoursed of, called pygmies : with a lively description of their stature, habit, manners, buildings, knowledge, and government being very delightful and profitable / by Joshua Barnes. Barnes, Joshua, 1654-1712.

Printed by W.G. for Obadiah Blagrave, London : 1675.
Running title: A discovery of the pygmies. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
